title: Thunderbird
content:
Hi,

I use the latest Thunderbird email client 128.2.2esr (64-bit). Microsoft announced that to make it work with outlook all users have to make changes in settings for more security. I did all that they wrote and can receive emails on my .......@outlook.com email address, but I can't send emails due to absence of authentication setting for outgoing server. I attached screenshots FYI. Is it possible to fix this issue? It's required to add authentication setting for outgoing server.

Regards, Leonid.
creator: samlost1001

title: Canon Scanner issue with Thunderbird using MP network EX 2.0
content: Canon Scanner issue with Thunderbird using MP network EX 2.0, I have 4 win 10 systems all using LiDe200 and 210 scanners with similar problems, 2 systems I can attach emails to Thunderbird only manually now as the Thinderbird email client isnt shown on the dropdown box only (None attach manually) and the other 2 systems cant send anything at all, comes up with the above and the with a message saying no program is accociated with it, even though Thunderbird is the default email client ............when I try to attached it to an email ............... I have NO IDEA how to fix this and I'm not technically very good either so need answers I can understand and do with out technical jargon I dont understand, I did ask a computer guy who does our systems but he didnt know what the problem was and had no solution for that. I am hoping you can help with it as I'm super frustrated with it, as it came on the back of another Thinderbird issue I have with security exceptions which defies being fixed. HELLLP !
creator: keith72

title: Version 128.2.2 Does not work with Office 365 Outlook
content:
I have Thunderbird 128.2.2 installed on my desktop and 128.2.1 on my laptop. My laptop works fine with an Office 365 Outlook IMAP account and an Office 365 Outlook POP account. My desktop with 128.2.2 indicates "Authentication failure while connecting to server".

I downgraded my desktop to 128.2.1 and it works fine.

I assume there is a new bug in 128.2.2 that causes the problem.
creator: aiz1211

title: Unable to view my email with 128.2.2.  Cannot log into Mozilla after going back to version 115.15.0
content:
Hi. I run Windows 10 home edition, 64-bit. I was using Thunderbird 115.15.0, but was instructed to run an update that would give me vers128.2.2. After updating I was unable to view my email normally. I was able to open any given email, but when I went to close it my entire queue of messages in my in/out boxes disappeared. 

Closing my client and reopening brought up my folder and all my emails again, but I kept going  through the same cycle each time I opened an email.

I went through account setup and am on the screen that states "Set Up Your Existing Email Address." I'm not 100% sure of my password as I don't have to enter it when accessing Thunderbird, but I tried several. Any rate Thunderbird was able to find my server and I verified the manual configuration setting with my ISP. When I press "Done" at the bottom of the page I receive an error stating "Unable to log in at server. Probably wrong configuration, username or password". I'm attaching pics of the account setup screen. As of now I don't have the option to send/receive or even create a new email. I could really use some help with restoring my emails, regardless of what version Of Thunderbird I need to install. Thanks.
creator: trusty73

title: Server 783804 is not responding
content: Hi, In our office we cant send or receive any emails from our customers. What is the problem? How we can fix that? Server783804.
creator: janickimarcin6

title: Cannot open message, blank panel
content:
Hi!


I try to open a message and nothing shows up, just empty grey space. This bug affects multiple thunderbird instances at version 128.2.0esr .

Here is the error message from the console:

Uncaught NS_ERROR_UNEXPECTED: 

   get remoteType chrome://global/content/elements/browser-custom-element.js:457    changeRemoteness resource:///modules/MailE10SUtils.sys.mjs:73    displayMessage chrome://messenger/content/aboutMessage.js:236    displayMessage chrome://messenger/content/about3Pane.js:5887    _onSelect chrome://messenger/content/about3Pane.js:4500    handleEvent chrome://messenger/content/about3Pane.js:4322    onSelectionChanged chrome://messenger/content/tree-view.mjs:1712    _selectSingle chrome://messenger/content/tree-view.mjs:1515    handleEvent chrome://messenger/content/tree-view.mjs:422
creator: galtom84

title: email berichten automatisch gedelet als je het programma start verhelpen
content: Waarom worden de berichten automatisch verwijdert in je Postvak in op bepaalde tijden als je het programma opstart/inloggen. En waar zijn die nieuwe berichten dan gebleven kunnen deze nog terug gehaald worden. En hoe kan je dit voorkomen dat dit niet gebeurt met opstarten. Vind dit een groot probleem dat belangrijke emails die je wilt bewaren nooit onvangt of verwijdert worden terwijl je dit niet wilt. Wil graag een oplossing hiervoor.
creator: clampers

title: emails appearing as code only
content:
My emails are only appearing as a code e.g. c1AUhZLZ8o9Dy42LgCwKnewC

Is this to do with my settings?
creator: doug126

title: When viewing the mail, another one opens - stuck
content: When I want to view an email, I don't see the one I open, but another email is displayed, where an image is inserted into the body of the email. Like it's stuck somehow. It's annoying because I don't know what is written in the correct email. Restarting the program or the computer did not help.
creator: koubek.michal

title: Email folders gone after moving profile to different drive partition
content: Hello, I have a Laptop with Windows 11 Home and Thunderbird 128.2.1esr installed. Because my system partition was fully and my Thunderbird data took about 60GB I wanted to move it to a data partition on the same drive (C: -> H:). I found a tutorial that explained to shut down Thunderbird. Move/Copy the profile folder form C:Users\x\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\profiles\profile-name.default to the new desired location on H:. Then create a new Thunderbird profile via the profile manager that points to the new location and set it to default. Then turn on Thunderbird and thats it. It did it and it seem to work first. Everything was there after checking in Thunderbird. Then I decided to delete the old profile folder to free space up on C:. When I turned Thunderbird on again some stuff was missing. There are local folders, a gmail account and three email accounts from another provider. The local stuff and gmail look good, everything on its place. But the folders from the other provider are missing completely. Only the inboxes are there. But since they were kept empty always I can't tell if thats correct or a problem. The owner always kept the inbox empty by moving stuff to other folders (inside the account). But they are all not shown since the second start.
creator: e.a1964

title: Některé přijaté emaily nelze přečíst, místo textu jsou kody html. Oprava složky pomůže, ale....
content:
Dobrý den, řadě lidem jsem doporučil Thunderbird, poslední cca měsíc či dva jsem zaregistroval zvýšené problémy se čtením některých doručených zpráv. Místo emailové zprávy se objeví nepřečtitelný html kod. Provedu (přes Vlastnosti) Opravu složky (doručená pošta), pošta se znova načte a je vše v pořádku, ALE! 1/ děje se to více uživatelům (každý týden toto řeším) 2/ u některých počítačů se to děje opakovaně a "dokolečka Opravuji"

Kontroloval jsem úložiště (SSD) a zatím nenašel chybu. Je jedno jestli je ve složce Doručená pošta v řádu 100 mail, nebo třebas 2000 mailů, chyby jsou u různých počtů. Též se to týká různých pokytovatelů hostingů, kde je email registrován.

Nemáte někdo tip, kde by mohl být problém? Verze TB jsou většinou aktuální nebo 1-2 licence pod aktuální. Nemám vysledováno, zda se objeví tento jen v momentě, kdy je připravena aktualizace, nebo se toto děje i v již aktuální verzi TB. V příloze částečně zanonymizována část těla zprávy (spodní část je delší, jedná se jen o výřez)

díky za pomoc Jan
creator: jkoucun

title: Thunderbird not receiving emails
content: Have been using Thunderbird for years with 4 email accounts, until recently all is well , now i presume after the latest update i, now struggle to receive any emails , i normally load Thunderbird and after a few minutes the emails come in with a star by the inbox with the number of emails , now i have to click new messages and a new screen/box appears (see photo) and have to accept for each email account Hope you can understand my problem. Thanks Rhys Owen rhysjohnowen68@gmail.com
creator: rhysjohnowen68

title: Incoming messages shatterred
content:
Dzień dobry,

Od jakiegoś czasu, nieregularnie ale ostatnio coraz częściej, mamy problem z przychodzącymi wiadomościami w TB: nie widać treści wiadomości (i załącznika jeśli jest). Czy to w wysłanych czy w archiwum. Zamiast tego w treści wiadomości jest jak na zrzucie z ekranu.

Czy mają Państwo pomysł, jaka może być przyczyna?

Pozdrawiam

DM
creator: dariusz.mucha

title: ELIMINIARE ACCOUNT
content: ho eliminato una decina (10) account di posta che sono scaduti o sostituiti con altri. ogni volta che entro mi richiede le password di accesso per entrare in questi eliminati e mi sono rotto i coglioni. possibile che non si riesci ad elimare con una procedura semplice. chiedo gentilmente i passaggi per non dover distruggere il pulsante del mouse per annullare le richieste. grazie.
creator: MALACRIDACED

title: Problema ricezione messaggi
content:
Buongiorno, Nelle ultime settimane c’è successo questo problema: 1. Stiamo ricevendo su un computer della rete, alcune e-mail da utenti diversi, che hanno come contenuto questo testo (identico per tutte le e-mail): --------------0ahdLMFn1XHiihwC97ePkgI3-- 2. Premetto che sugli altri computer della rete, dov’è installato Thunderbird riceviamo le e-mail in maniera corretta. 3. Segnaliamo il fatto che gli utenti delle e-mail hanno tutti una @gmail 4. Informazioni sul computer dove avviene questo problema: a. Vers. Thunderbird 128.2.2esr (64 bit) b. S.O. Windows 11 Home Vers. 23H2 Build 22631.4169 5. Informazioni su uno dei computer dove il problema non avviene: a. Vers. Thunderbird 19045.4894 (64 bit) b. S.O. Windows 10 Home Vers. 22H2 Build 19045.4894

Vi ringraziamo in anticipo Alessandro Salis
creator: info11868

title: errore invio email
content:
Non posso più inviare email da qualsiasi account che ho su Thunderbird non ho modificato nulla, improvvisamente quando invio una mail mi esce l'avviso INVIO DEL MESSAGGIO NON RIUSCITO senza altre specifiche. Ricevo regolarmente. Da cosa dipende? La versione di Thunderbird è la 78.14.0

I would appreciate any guidance on how to resolve this issue and ensure that Thunderbird recognizes the new Zimbra setup without attempting to access the old Gmail account. Thank you!

title: Filesystem notification initialization error FAM/Gamin library
content:
Starting in the last month or so, when I login to my email account using Thunderbird I get a Filesystem notification initialization error asking me to check for configuration errors in the FAM/Gamin library. (Side note the error only stays as long as my mouse is hovering over it then it vanishes so I can't get a screenshot or copy and paste the text.) I am still able to send messages, receive new messages, and access saved messages in my local folders, so I am not sure what this error means.

I just got off the phone with my email service provider who confirmed that they are not seeing any issues on the server end, so It appears to be something on the Thunderbird client side. I tried clearing the startup cache and that did not resolve the issue.

Using version 115.15.0 (64-bit) on PureOS which is a variant of Debian. PureOS is designed for extra security so there is a delay between the release of new versions and the time that purism.com releases the update to PureOS. It may be I just have to wait for Purism to release version 128...

Thanks for any suggestions.
creator: echline

title: High Processor Usage with Thunderbird Window Closed (Mac)
content:
This is a continuation of a problem I reported earlier... https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1442170

Updating to version 115.9 did not solve the problem. Today I updated to 115.10.1 and the problem persists. Thunderbird is also recommending that I update to version 116, but I don't even see that listed on the Mozilla web page for the change logs.

Thunderbird 115.10.1, Mac OS 10.13.6, iMac 20-in Early 2008 model.

I can open Thunderbird and check mail in multiple accounts. If I close the Thunderbird window (but leave the app running), CPU usage will eventually jump up to more than 100%. It does not happen right away, but could take 10 minutes or so. Currently it is at 115% processor usage. If I open the Thunderbird window again, the processor usage drops to under 8%, then drops again to below 0.4%.

creator: fprevost

title: Unable to send messages using Office 365 / Thunderbird for Linux
content:
I installed Thunderbird and typed in my Office 365 email information to connect my account. Thunderbird found the correct IMAP settings, which I verified on Microsoft's website. It proceeds to open a browser so I can authenticate my account. After that succeeds it starts downloading all of my messages & folders. I thought everything went fine until I attempted to send a message. I get the following error:

Login to server smtp.office365.com with username me@mydomain.com has failed.

It gives me the option to enter a new password, which doesn't make sense since it's oAuth2 but I created an app password to see if that would work, and it didn't. The only other options are cancel & retry which don't help either.

I thought maybe something went wrong with the authentication process so I uninstalled thunderbird and started again with the same results. I've tried many other server settings, but nothing works, so I'm here.

Current Settings:

Server Name: smtp.office365.com User Name: me@mydomain.com Authentication Method: oAuth2 Security: STARTTLS Port: 587

I've tried: Using Port 465 / SSL/TLS Using Port 465 / STARTLS Using Port 587 / SSL/TLS Changing Auth method to Normal Password and then using app-specific password. Uninstall / Resintsall

One final thing to note: I followed the same process with my fastmail.com account, which worked flawlessly. I can send & receive fine.
creator: nicksasso21

title: Thunderbird keeps generating inbox-n folders
content:
I have been running Thunderbird for many years, currently on a Windows 10 PC, and always been pleased with its performance. Using it to monitor 5 email accounts, each on a separate folder. Recently I noticed that on three of the accounts extra folders are appearing named inbox-1, inbox-2, inbox-3... then inbox-5 appeared today. There is also inbox.msf.compact-backup and a couple of nstmp folders. They contain copies of all emails in the main inbox over differing periods but going back to 2016 when it was first loaded.

I assume this is something to do with compacting but why has it started it doing now and how do I get rid of these folders which are, presumably, duplicating all my messages and taking up disk space.

Regards, 

   Tad O~

Thunderbird ver 128.2.2esr POP3

title: Message filter field character ignored?
content:

title: Lost zebra stripes after upgrade to Thunderbird 128.2.3esr
content:
I recently upgraded to Thunderbird 128.2.3esr, and I no longer have the zebra stripes that alternate between my messages.

The userChrome.css file that appears in my profile's chrome folder is:

/* Light green, high-contrast zebra stripes in message list */

  1. threadTree treechildren::-moz-tree-row(odd) {

-moz-appearance: none !important; background-image: none !important; /* background-color:#99E02E !important;} */ 

  background-color:#EEFFBB !important;}

/* background-color:#AED6F1 !important;} */

  1. threadTree treechildren::-moz-tree-row(selected) {

background-color:#45A1FF !important;}

Is there a reason that this no longer works? Can it be modified to restore the zebra stripes? Or is there an alternative code that will restore functionality?

Thanks in advance!

title: Thunderbird has suddenly stopped sending or receiving emails
content:

creator: BigMart

title: Can't establish connection with Xfinity server.
content: A recent Windows update on my Dell laptop resulted in an unusable copy of Windows(thanks Microsoft). After much time and effort, Microsoft's only solution was to do a fresh install of Windows which we did. Of course all software and apps had to be reinstalled. I have used Thunderbird on this laptop for years successfully. I downloaded the most current verision of Thunderbird and installed it. I then attempted to add my email account. I entered my name, email account name, and password. Message came back, "Configuration found in Mozilla ISP database." Configuration shows Incoming: IMAP, SSL/TLS. Outgoing: SMTP, SSL/TLS. I then clicked on the "Done" box. Next an Xfinity window opens with my username. The next box says "Let's go". I clicked that box. A window pops open that says, "ACCESS DENIED, You don't have access "http://login.xfinity.com/login" on this server. I googled that line and found many responses. I tried many of the solutions shown to no avail. I then contacted Comcast/Xfinity. After hours on the phone and finally reaching Comcast Assurance Level 2, the agent and I tried various things and still to no avail. So, here I am. Anyone there have any ideas on how to proceed. Thanks to anyone who tries.
creator: RVCraig99
